Index.title: MyTesLab
Index.description: Discover and download premium free Tesla wrap designs. Instant 3D visualization studio.
Index.welcome_desc: Explore high-quality free Tesla wrap designs, custom liveries, and body skins with real-time 3D preview. Define your unique style with our AI designer tool.

features.official_wraps_desc: Collection of various wrap designs for Tesla models
features.one_click_download_desc: Directly get high-definition texture files for free installation

Footer.tagline: The ultimate studio for custom Tesla wrap designs
Footer.disclaimer: We are an independent third-party creative platform and are not affiliated with, associated with, or endorsed by Tesla, Inc.

tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.s1_content: By accessing or using MyTesLab (the "Platform"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. This Platform is operated by Beijing Lanhu Technology Co., Ltd. (Âåó‰∫¨ËìùÂ£∂ÁßëÊäÄÊúâÈôêÂÖ¨Âè∏) to provide AI-driven digital creative tools for Tesla owners.
tos.s2_content: The Platform provides AIGC (Generative AI) technology for users to generate, upload, preview, and download digital sticker designs. All products are digital assets; no physical goods are delivered.
tos.s3_ownership_content: You retain ownership of original materials uploaded and AI works generated via the Platform.
tos.s3_uploads_content: You warrant that you own legal rights to all uploaded content. Uploading content that infringes on third-party copyrights, trademarks, or privacy is strictly prohibited.
tos.s3_sharing_content: By selecting to "Publicly Publish" your work, you grant the Platform and all other users worldwide a perpetual, royalty-free, irrevocable, and non-exclusive license to download, display, modify, and use such content.
tos.s3_license_content: You grant us the necessary rights to store, host, and display your content to provide our services.
tos.s4_content: We respect intellectual property. If a rights holder finds infringing content on the Platform, please email support@myteslab.com with: 1) Proof of rights and contact info; 2) Specific URL(s) of the infringing content; 3) A statement made in good faith. Upon a valid notice, we will follow a "Notice-and-Takedown" procedure. Repeat infringers will have their accounts permanently terminated.
tos.s5_content: MyTeslaLab is an independent third-party platform and is not affiliated with, associated with, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with Tesla, Inc. References to "Tesla" and vehicle models are solely for descriptive purposes.
tos.s6_content: Payments on this platform are processed by Polar (Polar.sh), acting as our Merchant of Record. Polar is responsible for transaction security, tax compliance, and billing.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.s1_content: We collect your email for account management and uploaded images for AI model inference.
privacy.s2_content: Your payment information (e.g., credit card numbers) is handled directly by Polar.sh. We do not store any sensitive financial data.
privacy.s3_content: We do not sell your personal data to third parties, except as required by law or necessary for service provision (e.g., payment processing).
privacy.s4_content: You may contact us at any time to request the deletion of your account and associated uploaded data.

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.s1_content: Due to the instantaneous and irreversible nature of AI generation credits and digital downloads, all sales are generally final and non-refundable once credits are consumed or assets are delivered.
refund.s2_content: If a technical failure occurs (e.g., credit deduction without generation), please contact support@myteslab.com within 72 hours. We will restate credits after verification.
refund.s3_content: The Platform reserves the right of final interpretation regarding any refund requests or policy abuse.

Pricing.title: Top Up Your Credits
Pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for you. 10 credits per generation.

descriptions.starter: Perfect for trying out new styles.
descriptions.explorer: The best choice for most Tesla owners.
descriptions.collector: For hardcore modders and creative minds.

Pricing.secure_payment_desc: Secure payment processed by Polar.sh. One-time purchase, no subscription.
Pricing.page_description: Purchase AI generation credits to create custom Tesla wrap designs. Choose from flexible pricing plans starting at $4.99.
Pricing.feature_1_desc: Credits never expire and can be used anytime to generate custom Tesla wrap designs
Pricing.feature_2_desc: Download wrap design files for use on your Tesla's in-car display system
Pricing.feature_3_desc: Visualize your designs on accurate 3D models of Tesla vehicles before downloading
Pricing.feature_4_desc: Optionally share your creations with the global MyTesLab community
Pricing.faq_1_a: Each AI generation costs 10 credits. Credits are added to your account immediately after purchase and never expire.
Pricing.faq_2_q: What do I get after generation?
Pricing.faq_2_a: You receive a high-resolution PNG file of your custom wrap design, which you can download and use on your Tesla's in-car display system.
Pricing.faq_3_a: Due to the instant nature of digital credits, refunds are generally not available once credits are consumed. However, if you experience technical issues, please contact support@myteslab.com within 72 hours.
Pricing.faq_4_a: No, all purchases are one-time payments. There are no recurring charges or subscriptions.

model-3.description: Discover premium Model 3 wrap designs, custom liveries, and skin inspirations. From matte black to AI-generated patterns, find the perfect wrap skin and texture for your Tesla Model 3.

model-y.description: Explore custom Model Y wrap designs, official body skins, and livery schemes. Visualize colors and styles in 3D to transform your Tesla Model Y's appearance with unique textures.

cybertruck.description: The ultimate collection of Cybertruck wrap designs, futuristic liveries, and custom body skins. Preview stainless steel alternatives and high-definition texture patterns in real-time 3D.

model-s.description: Elegant and high-performance wrap designs, luxury liveries, and skins for Tesla Model S. Enhance the performance look of your Model S with premium custom wrap textures.

model-x.description: Unique Model X wrap inspiration and livery skins. Preview designs with falcon wing doors and choose the best personalized style for your Tesla Model X with our 3D visualization.

model-3-2024.description: Premium wrap designs and liveries for the refreshed Model 3. Preview sharper lines and modern proportions in 3D with high-definition textures.

model-y-2025-standard.description: Latest wrap designs and colorways for the Model Y 2025+. Explore sleek proportions, modern finishes, and high-quality textures in real-time 3D.

NotFound.title: Page Not Found
NotFound.desc: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

Checkout.success_desc: Thank you for your support! Your credits are being processed and will usually arrive within a few seconds.
